snippet: To the Editor:   After years of pressuring Japan to open its markets to rice imports, United States negotiators finally won a battle for freer trade at the expense of truth in advertising (Business Day, Dec. 8)....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: After years of pressuring Japan to open its markets to rice imports, United States negotiators finally won a battle for freer trade at the expense of truth in advertising (Business Day, Dec. 8).

headline.main: Look at What Rice for Japan Will Cost Us
